metadata.description: High school gamer Masato Oosuki is stoked to be transported into a video game world and show off his chops...but why is his doting, embarrassing mother in the game with him, too?! And why is she so good at it?! Welcome to a whole new kind of momcom role-playing adventure based on the original light novel series!
metadata.name: Do You Love Your Mom and Her Two-Hit Multi-Target Attacks?
